name: Ext_R5_MedicationStatement_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationStatement.reason for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationStatement.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationStatement|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Reason for why the medication is being/was taken
element.definition: A concept, Condition or observation that supports why the medication is being/was taken.
element.comment: `MedicationStatement.reasonCode` maps to R4 `MedicationStatement.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `MedicationStatement.reasonCode` maps to R4 `MedicationStatement.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `MedicationStatement.reasonReference` maps to R4 `MedicationStatement.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
